name: Samuel Parker
pod: Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States
bio: When Samuel Parker was born on 7 June 1765, in Worcester, Maryland, British Colonial America, his father, George Parker III, was 31 and his mother, Sarah, was 31. He married Mary Polly Parker in 1792, in Hancock, Georgia, United States. They were the parents of at least 8 sons and 6 daughters. He died on 23 May 1840, in Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States, at the age of 74, and was buried in Fairmount Cemetery, Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States.
